description: This 40-foot retractable clothesline allows you to save money and conserve energy. Hang wherever you need a clothesline: laundry room, bathroom, balcony--even an RV or boat. The line retracts automatically so it can be out of the way when not in use. The vinyl-covered clothesline and high-impact plastic housing will not rust.
title: Crawford-Lehigh RC40 40-Feet Retractable Clothesline
